name: Hadoop How To
tagline: Short, targeted, guides to all things Hadoop
body:
### This first of a four-part series shows how to use a string to pass multiple values between mapper and reducer, and from the reducer to output.

[Passing Multiple Values in Hadoop Part 1: Strings](stringMultipleValues/stringMultipleValues.html)


### Using the software lifecycle and build tool Maven, you can configure Eclipse for Hadoop development in minutes.

[Setup Eclipse for Hadoop Development Using Maven](hadoopMaven/hadoopMaven.html)

### These guides are brought to you by

Center of Excellence for Big Data (CoE4BD)  
Graduate Programs in Software  
University of St. Thomas  
St. Paul, Minnesota

http://www.stthomas.edu/CoE4BD
